**Government Tender Announcement**
### Waste Materials Collection and Disposal Contract Opportunity

The Construction de Défense Canada (CDC) invites bids from qualified suppliers for the provision of waste materials collection and disposal services for various sites in Quebec.

**Project Overview**

The project involves the collection, packaging, transportation, relocation, and disposal of waste materials, including the rental of containers. The estimated cost for this opportunity is $320,000.00 for a period of two (2) years, with the possibility of three (3) additional one-year extensions.

**Tender Details**

* **Reference Number:** MX-22667616167
* **Solicitation Number:** BA222382_79350
* **Publication Date:** January 26, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM
* **Contracting Entity:** Construction de Défense Canada, Region of Quebec
* **Contract Address:** 2030 Boulevard Pie-IX, Bureau 224, Montreal, QC H1V 2C8
* **Contact Information:** Alexandre Boily, alexandre.boily@dcc-cdc.gc.ca, 418-321-7609

**Important Information**

* Bidders must obtain the latest amendments to the tender documents from MERX, as amendments obtained from other sources may not be up-to-date.
* Only bidders who ordered the tender documents will be considered valid.
* There will be no site visit for this opportunity.
* The procurement is conducted in accordance with the requirements of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (GPA).

**Submission Requirements**

* Bidders can submit their offers and access the tender documents on the MERX website (http://www.merx.com). There may be fees applicable; please refer to the MERX website (https://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more information.

**Additional Information**

* The preliminary tender results for this project will be available on MERX.
* Bidders who contact anyone other than the DCC Contracting Authority to obtain clarifications during the solicitation period may be disqualified.
* Bidders can obtain contract award results from the DCC website at Contract Activity - Defence Construction Canada (dcc-cdc.gc.ca).
